questions: When you have good study habits, you will   _  .
The living room is not a good place for study because it is too   _  .
article:
All students need to have good habits  : When you have good study habits, you can learn things quickly. You can also remember   them easily.
Do you like to study in the living room? This is not a good place because it is usually too noisy. You need to study in a quiet place, like your bedroom. A quiet place will help you only think about one thing, and you will learn better.
Before you study, do not forget to clean your desk. A good desk light is important  , too. You'll feel tired easily if   there is not enough light.
